name: Robot Evolution | Clicker Game of the Tiny Mutant Robot
name_original: Robot Evolution | Clicker Game of the Tiny Mutant Robot
description:
The tiny robot was abandoned by not knowing that it has own intelligence and ability to assemble and evolution its body parts from other robots to get stronger .
The aliens have created a lot of robot by imitating from creatures to work and entertain . The robot that aliens created do not have its own wisdom . It will proceed according to the order as the conventional machines . This time, the aliens tried to create a robot with a brain and can develop itself up but the result was so disappointing. This tiny robot was like the normal robot with weakness. Therefore the aliens discarded it at the abandoned factory in the space without knowing that it has its own wisdom and can further develop itself by assembling steel , iron and parts of another robot into a new body to become the ultimate strongest robot .
